data_type: aggregate statistical information with respect to traffic pattern
text: However, notwithstanding the foregoing, we may share your personal information in limited situations as follows: aggregate statistical information with respect to "traffic" patterns and usage of Passageways Websites may be provided to our partners or affiliates; provided that such information has been rendered non-personally identifiable.
We also receive automatic and passive data (both personally identifiable and otherwise) from the computer used to access Passageways Websites and when you interact with Passageways Websites.

We use cookies and other automated and passive tools (such as log files) to gather broad demographic information for internal marketing and demographic studies; to help identify you as a Registered User and to track and personalize your use of Passageways Websites so as to improve your user experience; to assess overall activity on Passageways Websites, including tracking interest in particular features of Passageways Websites and our Services; and for internal operations, including troubleshooting, diagnosing problems with servers, data analysis, testing, research and service improvement.
